comments: I had her for both 1101 and 1102. We only did an essay every unit. It really wasn\'\'t that much work compared to other professors. I focused more on the content of my essays but she\'\'ll take off points for things such as not using the word that. She edits your rough draft for you. This wasn\'\'t a stressful class. You\'\'ll make an A if you simply read.

She was really sweet and cared about her students. She made exceptions for me when I was out of town and worked with me on getting things turned in. She has five major papers that she grades very fairly, she lets you turn them in twice to get the best grade possible. A lot of reading in her class, a quiz everyday. So do not skip the readings!

She\'s hilarious. If you get on her "good" side and laugh at her jokes during the beginning, you\'ll be set for the rest of the semester. Essays are EASY. You write a rough draft, turn it in, she tells you what to fix, then you get a 100 on the final draft if you do what she says. Would definitely recommend her for an easy A.
This class was so much fun to go to. She talks a lot so be prepared for it. But the good thing is that you get to write a draft and she will mark it up then you can fix it for the final draft
Very easy class, but you won\'t learn anything. She cusses a lot, but she\'s really sweet keeps the class interesting.

-show up or lose a letter grade for every 3 days you\'re absent. -spends every class talking about material from the textbook. -grades are based entirely upon the five writing assignments. -unclear on where she comes up with her grades, though I\'m convinced its based on her personal opinions, not technicalities. -is unmoved by student concerns..

Ms. Z is wonderful! Her class requires reading of short essays in your book and she likes class discussion. She does a great job going over each story and has some great stories of her own. 7 papers total due but as long as you turn in your rough draft a week before the due date, she\'ll revise it for you, giving you an A when you turn it in!
Shes very interesting personality about herself.

Mrs. Zaglewski is a good teacher overall. I wouldn\'t take her if you plan on missing any class because her attendance is strict. you only have a total of 7 papers to write. Also, she doesn\'t tolerate any usage of cell phones. if you do your work there isn\'t going to be any problems

Amazing teacher. If you don\'t talk to others in her class but talk to her, she will love & respect you. You can talk to her about any piece of literature or movie and she will know what you are talking about.
Professor Z. was and is an excellent teacher. She would always review the material before each essay was due. As long as you came to class she would help you with anything that you needed.

She is a wonderful teacher! she lets you write about real events and you can pretty much choose what to wrote about. you can write any kind of essay you want. she is very sarcastic and just an all around joyful teacher. she tells personal stories that actually have to do with what you are talking about in class! the only problem with her is she tak

Ms. Z is a great educator. Sarcastic humor is intertwined with her passionate interest in literature to make enjoyable lectures. She couldn\'t be more helpful to students. She will review your assignments before they\'re due to help you out. Insist on Ms. Z!!
